context: Any books by Robert T. Kiyosaki?
Robert T. Kiyosaki wrote Rich Dad, Poor Dad. Have you heard of that one?
Heard of, but don't think I have read. When was it released?
That was released in 1997, the same year that 花ざかりの君たちへ 1. 花ざかりの君たちへ 1 is written by David Ury.
What do you know about the book The Angel of Darkness?
resp: All I know is that The Angel of Darkness was a novel written by Caleb Carr.
